mapper.insert: insert into course( course_name, teacher_name, course_Rate )values ( #{courseName}, #{teacherName}, #{courseRate})

insert into course( course_name, teacher_name, course_introduce, college_id)
(SELECT #{item.courseName}, #{item.teacherName}, #{item.courseIntroduce}, 9999 from dual)
mapper.select: SELECT c.course_id, c.teacher_name, c.course_name, c.course_rate, c.course_count, c.course_introduce, c.recommend, c.college_id, co.college_name, co.faculty_name FROM course c, college co WHERE c.course_id = #{courseId} and c.college_id = co.college_id
